original_text: He must not kill the other goat. It is an atonement to the Lord. It will pay for the bad things that the people have done. It is to take away the people's punishment. He must send it away into the desert.’
korean_text: 아사셀을 위하여 제비 뽑은 염소는 산 채로 여호와 앞에 두었다가 그것으로 속죄하고 아사셀을 위하여 광야로 보낼지니라

sentences.original_text: He must not kill the other goat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 염소를 죽여서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: It is an atonement to the Lord
It will pay for the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 나쁜 일들에 대한 대가를 치를 것이다

sentences.original_text: It is to take away the people's punishment
He must send it away into the desert
